titleInfo.title: ‘OUTLINE PLAN and SECTIONS of the Promontory of MARSHAG on the S.E. side of the Peninsula of ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paper with additions in pencilDimensions:571 x 1404 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Compiled and signed by a Special Committee on the Aden Defences formed of Engineers Lieutenant Colonel C.W. Grant and Major Artillery William Jacob, Bombay 23rd April 1844.Relief shown by contours.Contains an outline plan and sections of Ras Marshag (also known as Steamer Point) with grid lines added in pencil to the southern tip of the peninsula. Lettered for reference.
